# OS generated files
.DS_Store
.DS_Store?
._*
.Spotlight-V100
.Trashes
ehthumbs.db
Thumbs.db

# Editor directories and files
.idea/
.vscode/
*.sublime-project
*.sublime-workspace

# Node modules (if you add npm later)
node_modules/
package-lock.json
yarn.lock

# Distribution directories
dist/
build/

# Log files
*.log
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*

# Local environment files
.env
.env.local
.env.development.local
.env.test.local
.env.production.local

# Temporary files
tmp/
temp/

# VSCode specific files that should not be tracked
.vscode/settings.json
.vscode/tasks.json
.vscode/launch.json
.vscode/extensions.json

# Include all files in the assets directory, even if they match above patterns
!assets/**
